name: Tank Shooting Sniper Game
description:
This Bazooka Tank Shooting Sniper Game bring you back to severe world war, you are a fighting soldier against enemies and bring back peace to the world.
For thwarting enemies army movement, damage their force and power, you have an important mission, that is using bazooka shooting all movement enemies cars and tanks, they all move their army to the war area. So you will damage enemies army force and power
This Bazooka Tank Shooting Sniper Game is very interesting bazooka shooting sniper game with smooth controls and exciting game play. Just download and play this Bazooka Tank Shooting Sniper game

Bazooka Tank Shooting Sniper Game feature
* Awesome FPS bazooka sniper shooting game engine
* Fantastic amazing background graphics
* Smooth controls
* Nice graphics of Truck cars, army jeep tanks
* Bullets camera so you can track of how the bazooka bullets goes

How to play Bazooka Tank Shooting Sniper Game
This Bazooka Tank Shooting Sniper Game is very easy to play but interesting much
* Tile the screen to aim enememies army trucks, humvee jeep and tanks
* Press on fire button and shooting all enemies army force: trucks cars, humvee jeep, tanks
